partial_id_autocomplete.config.title: Partial ID Autocomplete Config
partial_id_autocomplete.config.id_segmen: The regex that is used to split an id into its segments
partial_id_autocomplete.config.collapse_: If enabled, nodes with only one child will not be suggested and their child will be suggested instead (even when "Only Suggest Next Segments" is enabled)
partial_id_autocomplete.config.only_sugg: If enabled, only the next segment of the id will be suggested (based on the segments that have already been entered). If "Collapse Single Child Nodes" is enabled as well, deeper segments are also suggested, in case they are the only child of their parent.
